meta.title: How Municipal Battery Programs Work | Labrador Field Systems
meta.description: From RFP to first generator-free event. Program design, procurement support, fleet deployment, and impact measurement.

hero.title: From RFP to the First Generator-Free Event
hero.description: Three-phase approach: Design & Procurement, Deploy & Operate, Measure & Report. Aligned with CPA grant structures and city procurement practices.

items.title: Hybrid Ownership Model
items.description: Flexible approach: city-owned units for field crews with vendor monitoring, plus vendor-managed services for markets, events, and parks. Not one-size-fits-all – designed around your budget and procurement constraints.

items.title: Performance-Based RFP Support
items.description: [PLACEHOLDER: Help staff write RFPs that specify outcomes (uptime, safety, reporting) instead of prescriptive hardware specs. Evaluation criteria include municipal experience, fleet management capabilities, and reliability track record – not just lowest price.]

items.title: Discovery to Pilot Launch
items.description: Process: Stakeholder discovery → Draft program brief → City RFP (if needed) → Vendor selection → Pilot kickoff. Timeline typically 3-6 months depending on procurement requirements and grant approval cycles.

items.title: Markets: Weekly Power Distribution
items.description: [PLACEHOLDER: Vendor receives weekly market schedule. Two operational models: (A) Drop off batteries Friday, pick up Sunday, or (B) Support city check-out system where vendors collect from city facility. Telemetry tracks typical loads per stall type (food prep, refrigeration, lighting).]

items.title: Events: On-Demand Deployment
items.description: [PLACEHOLDER: Event organizer submits intake form (date, location, expected loads). Vendor proposes battery configuration and quote. Event day: delivery, setup, on-site support during event, teardown. SLA guarantees replacement within 4 hours if unit fails.]

items.title: Parks: Rental Integration
items.description: [PLACEHOLDER: Park reservation system includes clean power requirement. Bounce house vendor or party renter contacts battery vendor directly (vendor contact provided in permit). Same-day delivery and pickup. Multi-battery configs for 4+ hour blower runtime.]

items.title: Fleet Management Software
items.description: Real-time dashboard showing battery state of charge, temperature, location, and load. Automated alerts for issues. Maintenance workflows flag weak cells. Grant reporting: kWh delivered, emissions avoided, utilization tracking.
